cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 31st Oct 2025 (AEST) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 31st Oct 2025 (AEST) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

privates.name: Basic Twin Room Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: King Studio private room motel style. It has a King bed. Sleeps 2. Own bathroom, kettle, microwave, fridge, TV, air com, outdoor table and chairs.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard 3 Bed Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Standalone Queen Villa, Sleeps 3. The villa has a Queen bed and a single bed. There is a kitchenette, fridge, microwave, TV Air con, and a patio with outdoor setting. It has it's own bathroom.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Deluxe 4 Bed Family Room Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: 2 Bedroom Standalone Villa. Sleeps 4. The villa has 1 Queen bed and 2 Single beds. Own bathroom. Kitchenette. Lounge. TV. Dining table, Fridge, patio with outdoor furniture.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.
